br.span: will Remain Closed Through the End of the School Year.

img.title: School Closure Resources
img.span: During this unprescendented time, West Allegheny School District will continue to provide important updates to keep our families informed. Please see tabs down the left side for Archived Communications as well as informationing regarding Remote Learning Frequently Asked Questions, Technology Guide, Device Lending and Meal Service.

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video
